means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 普兰克来源于古法语，含义是“木板”(plank)，可能是地貌名称，跨溪木板桥

sentence.Network_en: Frank put the first plank down and nailed it in place.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗兰克放下第一块厚木板，把它钉在合适的位置上。

sentence.Network_en: Clamp one end of the plank to the edge of the table.
sentence.Network_cn: 把厚木板的一端用夹具固定在桌子的边上。

jx.jx_en_mean: (formerly) be forced by pirates to walk blindfold along a plank over the side of a ship to one's death in the sea
jx.jx_cn_mean: 走跳板（旧时被海盗逼迫蒙着眼在船舷外的一块木板上行走直至坠海身亡）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old Northern French planke, from late Latin planca 'board', feminine (used as a noun) of plancus 'flat-footed'

entry.def: A plank is a long, flat, rectangular piece of wood.

example.ex: It was very strong, made of three solid planks of wood.
example.tran: 它由3块坚固的木板做成，很结实。

entry.tran: （团体或政党的）政纲条目；（政策或纲领的）要点
entry.def: The main plank of a particular group or political party is the main principle on which it bases its policy, or its main aim.

example.ex: Encouraging people to shop locally is a central plank of his environment policy.
example.tran: 他的环境政策的核心是鼓励人们购买当地产品。

means.word_mean: 1. a stout length of sawn timber; made in a wide variety of sizes and used for many purposes
2. an endorsed policy in the platform of a political party
2. set (something or oneself) down with or as if with a noise;

sentences.sentence: "He planked the money on the table"

means.word_mean: 3. cook and serve on a plank;

auth_sentence.content: The next walk he makes could be along the plank.
auth_sentence.res_content: The next walk he makes could be along the plank.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The next walk he makes could be along the plank.

auth_sentence.content: Plank floors were set only a few feet above sodden mud.
auth_sentence.res_content: Plank floors were set only a few feet above sodden mud.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Plank floors were set only a few feet above sodden mud.

auth_sentence.content: Spreading the word remains a central plank of the sport's philosophy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Spreading the word remains a central plank of the sport's philosophy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Spreading the word remains a central plank of the sport's philosophy.

sentences.en: We use a plank to cross the ditch.
sentences.cn: 我们用一块木板过了沟。

means.word_mean: 政纲条目, 政策要点

sentences.en: They intend to win the next election on the plank of developing trade.
sentences.cn: 他们想以发展贸易的纲领来赢得下次选举。

jushi.chinese: 我们用一块木板过了沟。
